incidents.name: Automated Alert: Minimal Customer Impact - Delay in Processing Inbound Email Messages in Conversations

incident_updates.body: We have fully investigated the delay in processing inbound email messages in Conversations and it was determined that the impact was limited to a small set of customers, who have been contacted individually to address any concerns. All systems are operational.

Our monitoring systems have detected a delay in processing Inbound Email Messages in Conversations. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Issue With Invoking Webhook for Outgoing Caller Ids Resource Verification for a Subset of Customers

incident_updates.body: We are investigating an issue when invoking the Webhook for Outgoing Caller Ids resource verification for a subset of customers . We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Caller Id service failing to invoke the webhook when the method is GET. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Multiple Small Carriers in United States of America

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to multiple small carriers in United States of America. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We’ve discovered that US Toll-Free numbers and US Short Code numbers aren’t impacted by this incident. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: MMS Delivery Delays to and From a Subset of Twilio Numbers in Australia

incident_updates.body: We continue to observe latency in MMS delivery when sending messages to and from a subset of Twilio phone numbers in Australia specially during the Australia peak traffic between 14:00 until 20:00 PST. We have identified that the primary cause of this latency is an on-going undersea cable fault. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to observe latency in MMS delivery when sending messages to and from a subset of Twilio phone numbers in Australia specially during the Australia peak traffic between 14:00 until 20:00 PST. We have identified that the primary cause of this latency is an on-going undersea cable fault. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Reports Delays to Spark and 2 Degrees Networks in New Zealand

incident_updates.body: We are no longer experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Spark and 2 degrees networks in New Zealand for a subset of shortcodes. This incident has been resolved.

We are observing recovery in SMS delivery reports delays to Spark and 2 degrees networks in New Zealand for a subset of shortcodes. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are still experiencing SMS delivery reports delays to Spark and 2 degrees networks in New Zealand for a subset of shortcodes. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.
